title: Ukraine Phone Call / First Impeachment
summary: Impeached for abuse of power and obstruction of Congress. Pressured Ukraine to investigate Joe Biden in exchange for military aid. Whistleblower complaint triggered investigation. Acquitted by Republican-controlled Senate with only Romney voting to convict.
keyFacts: Impeached for abuse of power and obstruction of Congress (December 18, 2019)
Pressured Ukraine to investigate Joe Biden in exchange for military aid
July 25, 2019 phone call with Ukrainian President Zelensky
Whistleblower complaint filed August 12, 2019; released September 26, 2019
Only Senator Romney voted to convict

sources.text: House vote, December 18, 2019; Articles of Impeachment
